#cloud-config
## Add and configure new user cloo, authorized keys for aga, rama, richard and steve
users:
  - name: cloo
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - ssh-dss  richard@holly
      - ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIAFb1SNKeovfTz1JXrok00+s6YREBlgKFlrDEYh7Dh+D steve@cottagelabs.com
      - ssh-rsa  aga@cottagelabs.com
      - ssh-rsa  ramakrishnasakhamuru@Ramakrishnas-MacBook-Pro.local
      - ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAINtrZckwCxs5+U8FRUuysV5U+2o1jULYETUk6ZTmRuSa 
      - ssh-rsa  steve@cottagelabs.com
      - ssh-rsa  richard@cottagelabs.com
      - ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIAjvBPCryTSeDGS3DxNbzQ/JaBbAsivdPzeKgnDKKlad ansible-steve-doaj@cottagelabs.com
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    groups: sudo
    shell: /bin/bash

## Disable password authentication with the SSH daemon
ssh_pwauth: false

## Update apt database and upgrade packages on first boot
package_update: true
package_upgrade: true

## Install additional packages on first boot
packages:
  - git
  - screen
  - htop
  - tree
  - ncdu
  - python3-dev
  - python3-pip
  - gcc
  - nginx
  - apache2-utils
  - certbot
  - python3-certbot-nginx
  - rng-tools
  - python3-virtualenv
  - python3-distutils
  - supervisor
  - libxml2-dev
  - libxslt-dev
  - lib32z1-dev
